data.text:
@Kateviola @FreelancersMake @WeAreTheMU It's really painful to lose the money especially after the last 2 years and with everything rising. I spent an hour on the phone renegotiating my phone bill to save £2 a month and then the next day lost over £1000 of work because I tested positive 😭
Cases are rife here too!
@LawCheryl @FreelancersMake @WeAreTheMU Sympathy. I waved goodbye to £350 worth of coaching over half term when I got it. Cases soaring in my area. 🤷🏻‍♀️
